file.name: test_allof.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: title
  version: v0.1.0
paths:
  "/simpleInteger":
    post:
      operationId: simpleInteger
      description: Simple integers with validation.
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              allOf:
              - type: integer
                minimum: -5
              - type: integer
                minimum: -10
                maximum: 5
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
  "/nullableStrings":
    post:
      operationId: nullableStrings
      description: Nullable strings
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              allOf:
              - type: string
                description: IP address
                pattern: '^(([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\.){3}([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])$'
              - type: string
                nullable: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
  "/simpleObjects":
    post:
      operationId: simpleObjects
      description: Simple objects
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              allOf:
              - type: object
                properties:
                  foo:
                    type: string
              - type: object
                properties:
                  bar:
                    type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
  "/objectsWithConflictingProperties":
    post:
      operationId: objectsWithConflictingProperties
      description: Objects with conflicting properties
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              allOf:
              - type: object
                required:
                - foo
                properties:
                  foo:
                    type: string
                  bar:
                    type: integer
                    minimum: 1
                    maximum: 255
              - type: object
                properties:
                  foo:
                    type: string
                    minLength: 10
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
  "/objectsWithConflictingArrayProperty":
    post:
      operationId: objectsWithConflictingArrayProperty
      description: Objects with conflicting array property
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              allOf:
              - type: object
                required:
                - foo
                - bar
                properties:
                  foo:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: integer
                    minItems: 1
                  bar:
                    type: integer
                    minimum: 1
                    maximum: 255
              - type: object
                properties:
                  foo:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: integer
                    maxItems: 5
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
  "/referencedAllof":
    post:
      operationId: referencedAllof
      description: referenced allOf
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Robot"
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Robot"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
  "/referencedAllofOptional":
    post:
      operationId: referencedAllofOptional
      description: referenced allOf, but requestBody is not required
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Robot"
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Robot"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ok
components:
  schemas:
    Robot:
      allOf:
      - type: object
        required:
        - state
        properties:
          state:
            type: string
            enum:
            - 'on'
            - 'off'
      - "$ref": "#/components/schemas/WorldObject"
    Location:
      type: object
      required:
      - lat
      - lon
      properties:
        lat:
          type: number
        lon:
          type: number
    WorldObject:
      type: object
      required:
      - id
      - location
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        location:
          "$ref": "#/components/schemas/Location"
